TileAction

Class Bonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • TileAction.Bonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reward

    public class Bonus
extends Object
implements Reward
    Bonus class implements the Reward interface. Contains method to update player score by the value of the object. Also contains members that manage the lifetime of the reward.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brendan, Stephen Dao

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bonus(int x, int y)
      Creates a bonus at a specific coordinate position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decrementTicksRemaining()
      Method to decrement the lifetime of the object by 1 tick.
      int getScoreIncreaseValue()
      Getter for the score increase value of the object
      int getTicksRemaining()
      Getter for the remaining lifetime of the object.
      int getX()
      Getter for the x coordinate of object.
      int getY()
      Getter for the y coordinate of object.
      void updatePlayerScore()
      Updates player score by value of reward.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bonus

        public Bonus(int x,
             int y)
        Creates a bonus at a specific coordinate position. Also creates a random lifetime of the bonus, between 5 and 20 ticks
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate

      • getScoreIncreaseValue

        public int getScoreIncreaseValue()
        Getter for the score increase value of the object
        Returns:
        an int corresponding to how much an interaction with the object will increase the player score
